welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Phelan, where small town charm meets stunning natural beauty. Get ready to experience our charming community and explore our beautiful surroundings. We can't wait for you to make unforgettable memories here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southern California Logistics Airport serves commercial and cargo flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Southern California Logistics Airport handles freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
